DOC.brief_summary: In woman treat medicine help egg grow ( call ovulation induction ) , The investigator wish know whether add medicine ( call ovulation trigger ) help release egg ( ovulation ) would lead woman baby without cause harm compare give ovulation trigger .
DOC.detailed_description: Women treat clomiphene citrate help egg develop additionally receive medicine ( urinary hCG ) trigger release receive additional treatment . investigator try determine benefit harm administer ovulation trigger anovulatory woman receive treatment ovulation-inducing agent comparison spontaneous ovulation follow ovulation induction . comparison 2 group , group 1 receive clomiphene citrate trigger ovulation human chorionic gonadotrophin group 2 receive clomiphene citrate drug trigger ovulation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normoprolactinemic normogonadotropic ( WHO class II ovarian dysfunction ) 2 . Primary infertility oligomenorrhea ( bleed interval 35 day 6 month ) amenorrhea ( bleed interval 6 month ) 3 . Age 1840 year 4 . Duration primary infertility than2 year 5 . No history ovulation induction treatment 6 . No history thyroid disease 7 . Normal result hysterosalpingogram 8 . Husband normal semen analysis 1 . Ovarian cyst 2 . Endometrioma 3 . Liver disease
